messages.subject: My "My Thots" Salutation
messages.msgSnippet: It s a combination of the ending I use at the end of a Table Topic in Toastmasters + laziness of spelling it all out.  I like it because I am owning my
messages.messageBody:
It's a combination of the ending I use at the end of a Table Topic in Toastmasters + laziness of spelling it all out. I like it because I am owning my "thoughts" as mine. That leaves it open for you to disagree if you do and maybe encourages dialogue.

My thots on My Thots
Tim Thomas

----- Original Message -----
From: treegoddess@...
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, May 24, 2003 12:34 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] John Wayne


Tim and Maureen wrote:

>My (radical?) thots
>

I'm curious.... do you spell "thoughts" that way on purpose? I was
wondering if it's a play on words or something. :)

TreeGoddess
